entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You eliminated the head doctor and are now protected from the tranquilizing gas. It's time to head down to the lowest level of the lab and clean house.
entries.journal_entry_description: The head of these experiments is a Doctor Maldien. He cannot be allowed to continue his work.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Doctor Maldien is responsible for all of this treachery. Kill him and get his research materials.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Read the Doctor's journal and find out what he was working on.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: These beasts are getting to be unmanageable! We've taken to using a new tranquilizing gas on them. I had a control console installed nearby so I could get to it easily. I then developed a serum that completely negates the tranquilizing effects. I couldn't risk a gas leak on the research floor. I keep a hefty supply in the medical cabinet near the controls, just in case.
entries.task02_message_box_text: These beasts are getting to be unmanageable! We've taken to using a new tranquilizing gas on them. I had a control console installed nearby so I could get to it easily. I then developed a serum that completely negates the tranquilizing effects. I couldn't risk a gas leak on the research floor. I keep a hefty supply in the medical cabinet near the controls, just in case.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: To be able to defeat the creatures downstairs, weaken them with a tranquilizing gas.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The lower level should now be filled with tranquilizing gas. It will affect you unless you vaccinate yourself against it. The medical cabinet in Dr. Maldien's research lab has the serum that you need.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Get a Vaccine from the Medical Cabinet
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Good.  Head down to the lowest level of the lab and clear out that menagerie.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You received a message from Lt. Joth: Good. Head on down to the lowest level of the lab and clear out that menagerie.
